metadata.name: Gatekeeper Bypass via Xattr
metadata.comment: Detects macOS Gatekeeper bypass via xattr utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/xattr')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-d')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.apple.quarantine')))

output.summary: Detects macOS Gatekeeper bypass via xattr utility

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/1fed40dc7e48f16ed44dcdd9c73b9222a70cca85/atomics/T1553.001/T1553.001.md, https://www.loobins.io/binaries/xattr/
